description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The 25th anniversary of UNESCO - President Pompidou at the 25th anniversary celebrations. French liqueurs - international press tour the large French Liqueur distilleries. Homage to a conductor - former French operatic conductor Henri Buser will soon be 100 years old. 2. The fight against pollution - the Plant Biology laboratory of the Grenoble Nuclear Research Center. 3. Stamps for General de Gaulle - a commemorative issue on the eve of de Gaulle's death anniversary. 4. Paul Valery - at the French National Library, an exhibition on the occasion of the centenary of French poet, Paul Valery's birth.
